items.sentence: Did you tell Tom about what happened to Mary?

Oh, by the way, I have something to show you.

Tom doesn\'t understand how a computer works.
Tom doesn\'t use rinse. He only uses shampoo.

Shaving doesn\'t make your beard grow faster.

It\'s about thirty minutes from here on foot.
